pr_title: Rename OIDC expiration-grace property to lifespan-grace

timeline.author: sberyozkin

timeline.message: Rename OIDC expiration-grace property to lifespan-grace

timeline.bodyText:
Call me dumb, but this is really hard to understand :-) What about:
Life span grace period in seconds.
When checking token expiry, current time is allowed to be later than token expiration time by at most the configured number of seconds.
When checking token issuance, current time is allowed to be sooner than token issue time by at most the configured number of seconds.

?
